duration: 24:21 – Join Ruben and Clara on the tarmac of the old Kai Tak Airport as they discuss their current trip to Hong Kong! Topics include the Kowloon Walled City
language: comparing Hong Kong to Singapore and New York
scanner: and other topics discussed in the first person. We ran out of time

so the next episode will be from Osaka. 唔該.
